body: Hai! I'm sure many of you know me already. I thought I might make a new one in the new forums since there are alot of new peeps. So ask away..
body_tagged: Hai! I'm sure many of you know me already. I thought I might make a new one in the new forums since there are alot of new peeps. So ask away..
title: zaidms0987 AMA 2.0

replies.body: How did you come about creating your username?
replies.body_tagged: How did you come about creating your username?

replies.body: You got a bae or naw?
replies.body_tagged: You got a bae or naw?

replies.body:
@dux
I didn't :P. something you don't know is that this is my friends account that he doesn't use anymore so he gave it to me. My name isn't Zaid. 

@Evil
 only one person on avicus knows

1) uh sure 
2) None, what kind of question is this?  Lol 
3) nope thank god 
4) whatever is on my playlist :P

6) Usually I play simulation games in my PC with my Steering wheel, like OMSI, ETS2, CCD, ect. 7) I mostly play basketball (you should know this already lol)8) Nope9) Shoot10) doge
